body_html: Morning @ramonh. When the students submit their application, there is no turning back: they cannot modify it any longer. There is a before action in ApplicationDraftsController (disallow_modifications_after_submission) that prevents modification after it has been successfully lodged.
body_text: Morning @ramonh. When the students submit their application, there is no turning back: they cannot modify it any longer. There is a before action in ApplicationDraftsController (disallow_modifications_after_submission) that prevents modification after it has been successfully lodged.
body: Morning @ramonh. When the students submit their application, there is no turning back: they cannot modify it any longer. There is a before action in ApplicationDraftsController (`disallow_modifications_after_submission`) that prevents modification after it has been successfully lodged.
